wu-tang clan: it was the summer of 77. new york was just recovering from the riots due to the blackout. hip hop was young and growing rapidly. it was during that time when my father would often make journeys across waters. from shaolin on his plain to the place where many say this art form started. the ferry or the boat as most called it was a floatin forum for talent especially mcs who would often battle while en route to the city. it was on the boat where he would sharpen his sword on neighborhood mcs preparing for the battles that were soon to come...
